paremeterized_text:
Task: View the comments left by your instructor ([[Teacher]]) on your "[[Assignment]]" assignment in the "[[Course]]" course, and mark the comments as read. 

Steps to complete:
1. In Global Navigation, click the "Courses" link, then select "[[Course]]."
2. In Course Navigation, click the "Grades" link.
3. Locate the "[[Assignment]]" assignment in the grades list.
4. Click the Comment icon next to the "[[Assignment]]" assignment to view your instructor's comments.
5. Read all comments so that the unread indicator disappears.

instances.instance_text:
Task: View the comments left by your instructor (Tammy Teacherson) on your "Cognitive Psychology Research Summary" assignment in the "Psychology 101" course, and mark the comments as read. 

Steps to complete:
1. In Global Navigation, click the "Courses" link, then select "Psychology 101."
2. In Course Navigation, click the "Grades" link.
3. Locate the "Cognitive Psychology Research Summary" assignment in the grades list.
4. Click the Comment icon next to the "Cognitive Psychology Research Summary" assignment to view your instructor's comments.
5. Read all comments so that the unread indicator disappears.
